properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters of Southern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 4:31PM AST until February 14 at 2:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...Rough and hazardous marine conditions will prevail through Friday...

.A surface high pressure across the central Atlantic will drive fresh
to locally strong easterly winds across the regional waters,
creating hazardous marine conditions that will increase through
Friday.

* WHAT...Offshore seas of 4-7 feet, with east winds 10 to 20 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters of southern Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 8 AM Thursday to 2 AM AST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THURSDAY TO 2 AM AST FRIDAY
